label: subject orientation concept scheme
definition: a SKOS concept scheme for orientation

label: unspecified orientation
definition: orientation is not known because it is not specified

label: anterior side
definition: view of the anterior side of the part

label: posterior side
definition: view of the posterior side of the part

label: lateral side
definition: view of a lateral side of a part

label: right side
definition: view of the right side of a whole bilaterally symmetric organism

label: left side
definition: view of the left side of a whole bilaterally symmetric organism

label: dorsal side
definition: view of the dorsal side of the part

label: ventral side
definition: view of the ventral side of the part

label: adaxial side
definition: view of the adaxial side of the part
notes: BSPO has adaxial/abaxial axis http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BSPO_0000195 but not the sides defined by that axis

label: abaxial side
definition: view of the abaxial side of the part
notes: BSPO has adaxial/abaxial axis http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BSPO_0000195 but not the sides defined by that axis

label: apical side
definition: view of the apical side of the part

label: basal side
definition: view of the basal side of a part
